summary: The Kingdom of the Netherlands is a country made up of different territories, with the Netherlands being the biggest one. It's like a team where the Netherlands leads but all parts work together. The team includes Aruba, Cura√ßao, Netherlands, and Sint Maarten. Though they all have their own governments, the Netherlands helps with big things like defending the country and dealing with other nations. The Netherlands is in Europe, but the kingdom also has islands in the Caribbean. Lots of people live in the Netherlands, around 17 million, while the Caribbean parts have about 30,000 people.
title: Kingdom of the Netherlands
